page.title: 03A day in the life of........
page.content: Most mornings Iget up at about 7.15.First I have a wash and get dressed and make my bed .After that I go downstairs and eat my breakfast. Then I go and clean my teeth.Then I make sure I have everything packed for school.Then I brush my hair .We set off for school at 8.45.First of all we usually do reading and then a maths test.After that it is assembly time and play.Then we do groupwork until dinner.I sit on a table with Katie or Sarah.We go out to play. Then we do art and more groupwork and then go home.I call straight over for Kirsty and we go out.Then it is time for tea.Afterwards we watch the video or television and go to bed at 9.00 o clock.
